bolts

Class TaskCompletionSource<TResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bolts.TaskCompletionSource<TResult>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Task.TaskCompletionSource

    public class TaskCompletionSource<TResult>
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows safe orchestration of a task's completion, preventing the consumer from prematurely completing the task. Essentially, it represents the producer side of a Task, providing access to the consumer side through the getTask() method while isolating the Task's completion mechanisms from the consumer.

      Creates a TaskCompletionSource that orchestrates a Task.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskCompletionSource

        public TaskCompletionSource()
        Creates a TaskCompletionSource that orchestrates a Task. This allows the creator of a task to be solely responsible for its completion.
